𓏋

𓏋 ≈ 𐃫 LB*212 URN

𓊪 𓅮 𓊃 𓏋 | water pot | POß > Wasser Fass flask^^

W23 Ho.ber 𓏋 = HearT

𓎡 𓏋 𓍷 xɑtˀul Schatulle ⇔ urn

𜏠 ma ≈ 𒈾 na Napf in

𓏠 𓈖 𓏴 𓏌 𓏋 ≈ 𜏠 𜑊 𜎮 ma-ni-p 𒈠𒉌𒄿𒉿 ma-ni-i “manis” a cultic object of bronze

𜏠𜑊𜎮 𜒚𜎺𜎮 𜐾𜏳𜎅 𜑤𜒐𜒜𜎮 𜏇𜎅𜏂𜐲𜎂 ma-ni-p sa-hi-p hu-r-t ki-ri-pu-p hu-t-ta-k-na 𒈠𒉌𒄿𒉿 𒊓𒄭𒄿𒉿 𒄷𒌫tu3 𒄀𒊑𒉿 𒌒 𒄷𒌓𒋫𒀝𒈾 ma-ni-i-pi sa-hi-i-pi hu-ur2-tu3 ki2-ri-pi up hu-ut-ta-ak-na /manip sahip hurt kerep op hutakna/ “May the manis(?) of bronze be realized for my priests.”

manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓏴 𓏌 | ( 𜏠 ma ≈ 𒈾 na ) manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓏴 𓏌 | jar | 𜏠 𜑊 𜎮 “mani” 𒈠𒉌𒄿𒉿 manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓇋 𓏋 | jar, measure of capacity | manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓇋 𓏴 𓏌 | jar, measure of capacity | manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓈎 𓏏 𓏋 | jar ? | manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓎂 𓎿 | jar (for liquids) | manis ≈ 𓏠 𓈖 𓈙 𓍷 | cartouche

9.660 copper, bronze 𒂊𒊑𒉌;𒊓𒄴;𒊓𒄭𒄿;𒋛𒄭𒆕 e-ri-ni; sa-h; sa-hi-i; si-hi-kak
